headline.main: Help for the Overweight Student; Helping the Overweight

docs.abstract: LI pediatrician Dr Platon J Collipp describes LI Food and Exercise Program to help overweight schoolchildren diet and change eating and activity patterns; warns childhood obesity can foster major disease problems in adult life (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: OVERWEIGHT or obese schoolchildren, many of whom suffer feelings of inadequacy or incompetence because of their condition, are finding that a food and exercise program espoused by Long Island pediatricians has enabled them to lose weight and keep it off.
docs.snippet: OVERWEIGHT or obese schoolchildren, many of whom suffer feelings of inadequacy or incompetence because of their  condition, are finding that a food and exercise program espoused by Long Island pediatricians has enabled them to lose weight and keep it...

headline.main: A Pediatricians' Food and Exercise Program Fights Obesity Among Long Island Schoolchildren

docs.lead_paragraph: Overweight or obese schoolchildren, children, many of whom suffer feelings of inadequacy or incompetence because of their condition, are finding that a food and exercise program espoused by Long Island pediatricians has enabled them to lose weight and keep it off.
